actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing Congressional disapproval of delays in Social Security cost of living increases.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that the President should not transmit to Congress any budgetary or legislative proposal to delay cost-of-living increases for social security recipients and Congress should not approve any social security legislation which provides for such a delay.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing Congressional disapproval of delays in Social Security cost of living increases.
